title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 95.4 - Location
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 95.4 - Location

State Regulations

Records shall be available for public inspection and
copying at: (a) 2 World Trade Center, New York City; (b) 30 Russell Road, Albany; (c) 125 Main Street, Buffalo; or at the location where they are kept. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
95.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
